00027 enum Behavior_strategy {REFUSE, ACCEPT, FLIP, IMITATE_PREVALENCE, IMITATE_CONSENSUS, IMITATE_COUNT, HBM};
00028 #define BEHAVIOR_STRATEGIES 7
00029 #define NUMBER_WEIGHTS 7
00030 #define UNDEFINED_ATTITUDE -1
00031 
00032 typedef struct {
00033   // COMMON
00034   char name[32];
00035   int first;
00036   int enabled;
00037   int frequency;
00038   int strategy_cdf_size;
00039   double strategy_cdf[BEHAVIOR_STRATEGIES];
00040   int strategy_dist[BEHAVIOR_STRATEGIES];
00041   // FLIP
00042   double min_prob;
00043   double max_prob;
00044   // IMITATE params
00045   int imitation_enabled;
00046   // IMITATE PREVALENCE
00047   double imitate_prevalence_weight[NUMBER_WEIGHTS];
00048   double imitate_prevalence_total_weight;
00049   double imitate_prevalence_update_rate;
00050   double imitate_prevalence_threshold;
00051   int imitate_prevalence_count;
00052   // IMITATE CONSENSUS
00053   double imitate_consensus_weight[NUMBER_WEIGHTS];
00054   double imitate_consensus_total_weight;
00055   double imitate_consensus_update_rate;
00056   double imitate_consensus_threshold;
00057   int imitate_consensus_count;
00058   // IMITATE COUNT
00059   double imitate_count_weight[NUMBER_WEIGHTS];
00060   double imitate_count_total_weight;
00061   double imitate_count_update_rate;
00062   double imitate_count_threshold;
00063   int imitate_count_count;
00064   // HBM
00065   double susceptibility_threshold_distr[2];
00066   double severity_threshold_distr[2];
00067   double benefits_threshold_distr[2];
00068   double barriers_threshold_distr[2];
00069   double memory_decay_distr[2];
00070   double base_odds_ratio;
00071   double susceptibility_odds_ratio;
00072   double severity_odds_ratio;
00073   double benefits_odds_ratio;
00074   double barriers_odds_ratio;
00075 } Behavior_params;

00077 typedef struct {
00078   int * yes_responses;
00079   int * total_responses;
00080   int yes;
00081   int total;
00082   int * previous_yes_responses;
00083   int * previous_total_responses;
00084   int previous_yes;
00085   int previous_total;
00086   int last_update;
00087 } Behavior_survey;

00167 inline
00168 void Behavior::report_distribution(Behavior_params * params) {
00169   if (params->first) {
00170     printf("BEHAVIOR %s dist: ", params->name);
00171     for (int i = 0; i < BEHAVIOR_STRATEGIES; i++) {
00172       printf("%d ", params->strategy_dist[i]);
00173     }
00174     printf("\n"); fflush(stdout);
00175     params->first = 0;
00176   }
00177 }
